column4: oCean: Speaking about mounting...I have a server running in command line mode, no GUI. When I plug an external hard drive into it, I'd like it always to be mapped tu the same /dev/sd*-file. Is this possible?
by using filesystem labels, you can
so, when formatting the drive you can add a label (or use command e2label). Then you can specify that label in the /etc/fstab
type e2label and fstab in google and see :)
